item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Catherine Asaro
item.description: "Ah hell" -- Catherine Asaro

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Stupid, shiny Volvo owner." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by jennifer fallon
item.description: "we don't have a god of bloody stupid ideas" -- jennifer fallon

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Dru Pagliassotti
Gretchen add a quote by Lisa Shearin
item.description: "Whoever said ignorance is bliss must have died a horrible death with a really surprised look on his face." -- Lisa Shearin

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Lisa Shearin
item.description: "Most girls get flowers or candy. I get a declaration of martial law." -- Lisa Shearin

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Lisa Shearin
item.description: "Michael was still an enigma, wrapped in a riddle, coated in yum. Only now the enigma was a little less mysterious; I was a few clues closer to solving the riddle - but damn, that man would always be coated in yum." -- Lisa Shearin

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Lisa Shearin
item.description: "It's not treason if you win." -- Lisa Shearin

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Lisa Shearin
item.description: "There was a momentary lull in the shooting and spellslinging, and the kid started scrambling to his feet. I grabbed his arm and pulled him back down. “In my family that’s not silence; it’s reloading." -- Lisa Shearin

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Lisa Shearin
item.description: "I'd heard that if you saw a Reaper, you saw what you expected to see, what you thought the agents of Death would look like. Personally, I wanted to see little, fuzzy pink bunnies, but apparently my subconscious visualized tall, scary, and skeletal. My subconscious and I needed to have a long talk." -- Lisa Shearin

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Lisa Shearin
item.description: "You wearing a thigh sheath?” “Now what would be the sense of wearing just one? I have two thighs." -- Lisa Shearin

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Alyxandra Harvey
Gretchen add a quote by Alyxandra Harvey
item.description: "Solange leaned back against the wall, bored. “Are you done yet?” “Hell no,” Lucy said. She’d left nose prints on the glass. Nicholas smirked up at her. She blushed. “Ooops. Busted.” “I told you they could hear your heartbeat,” Solange said. “Even from up here.” “I can’t help it. Even if they all know they’re pretty and are insufferably arrogant,” she added louder. “Can they hear that?” “Yes.” “Good.” She glanced at me. “Yummy, right?” “I’m sure Isabeau would rather recover, not ogle my brothers,” Solange said. “You remember how stressed you were after the Hypnos?” “Please,” Lucy scoffed. “This is totally soothing." -- Alyxandra Harvey

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Alyxandra Harvey
item.description: "Do we have a plan?” “We fight like hell.” “Good plan." -- Alyxandra Harvey

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Alyxandra Harvey
item.description: "Only you would reduce centuries of the mythical undead to ‘fangy. ’ ” (Quinn to Lucy)" -- Alyxandra Harvey

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Alyxandra Harvey
item.description: "Finally, a bit of luck. Rat bastard,” I hissed down at Montmartre. “Mangy dog of a scurvy goat.” “That doesn’t even make sense,” Isabeau murmured. “Feels good though. Try it.” She narrowed her eyes at the top of Montmartre’s perfectly groomed hair. “Balding donkey’s ass. “ “Nice.” “Sniveling flea-bitten rabid monkey droppings.” “Clearly, you’re a natural." -- Alyxandra Harvey

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Alyxandra Harvey
item.description: "Logan, don’t be an ass.” “I have been sleeping in mud. I’m covered in dirt and blood and these were my favorite pants before I landed in raccoon shit." -- Alyxandra Harvey

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Maria V. Snyder
item.description: "Poisoned, pursued and living with a psychopath. Not what I would consider the good life. Death has its perks." -- Maria V. Snyder

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "Perv." He pointed to himself. "Male and eighteen. What's your point?" -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "Boys. I'd turn gay if they weren't so sexy. " -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Rachel Caine
Gretchen add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "So we do nothing? --Claire We do the best nothing you've ever seen. --Michael" -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "I don’t see a way in,” Eve whispered. Why are you whispering?” Myrnin whispered back. “Vampires can hear us, anyway." -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "You're kidding. I thought all geniuses read Latin. Isn't that the international language for smart people?"-Shane (Glass Houses)" -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "Is it arrogance if one is truly superior?" -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Gini Koch
item.description: "My crazy's working a lot better than your sanity." -- Gini Koch

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Gini Koch
item.description:
"It's a snake, then.'
'Rattler?'
'Most likely.'
I was taking this extremely well. 'We have to kill it. By we, of course, I mean you. I'll stand here and scream." -- Gini Koch

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Gini Koch
item.description: "You come from Planet Hunk, sent to Earth to protect and serve. And make the ladies happy." -- Gini Koch

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Gini Koch
item.description: "Paper balls? You were throwing balled up paper at an alligator?" -- Gini Koch

item.title: Gretchen add a quote by Courtney Allison Moulton
item.description: "I have a ninja sitting shotgun. Of course, I'm tense." -- Courtney Allison Moulton
